mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Brooklyn Trust Company building, designed by the prominent firm of York & Sawyer, a talented, prolific, and versatile team, was constructed in 1913-16 in a style modeled after the palazzi of the sixteenth-century Italian High Renaissance. -- http://www.flickr.com/photos/emilio_guerra/5171679113/ [work]
